name: Pencil Defence Force
description:
Ever get lost in your own copybook doodles?  As in... really lost?
As in SO LOST THAT YOU HAVE TO FIGHT YOUR WAY OUT...?
...THROUGH 20 PUZZLING LEVELS? Well if not, then you have yet to play Pencil Defence Force.

With a focus on avoiding any lengthy tutorials, PDF is a hand-drawn puzzle game that encourages the player to experiment with the tools given to complete each increasingly puzzling level.  This way, the sense of reward comes from learning how each tool provided to the player can be used to complete the task.

Featuring:

  • Hand-drawn animated graphics.
  • Accessible gameplay that doesn't get in the way of the puzzle solving.
  • Increasingly challenging levels with a sense of reward upon each level's completion.
Friendly Reminder.

Unless you're about to play this game, NEVER open a file with the name "PDF.exe".
